title: Live Like a Local: Ethnography
description: Discover ethnography, anthropology's immersive research method! Understand cultures from within. #ethnography #anthropology #culture #fieldwork

frames.narration: Imagine living in a different culture to understand it inside out.
frames.image_description: Animated globe spinning, zooming into diverse group of people interacting.

frames.narration: That's ethnography! Anthropology's deep dive into human cultures.

frames.narration: More than just watching, it's actively participating in daily life.
frames.image_description: Split screen: Tourist taking photos vs. anthropologist joining local activity.

frames.narration: Ethnographers immerse themselves to uncover cultural nuances.
frames.image_description: Researcher taking notes in field notebook, surrounded by local community.

frames.narration: Participant observation: Living amongst the people you study.
frames.image_description: Visual of an ethnographer sharing a meal with a local family, smiling.

frames.narration: Engaging in rituals, work, and everyday routines to learn.

frames.narration: Firsthand experience, not just reading about a culture.
frames.image_description: Open book fading into a scene of fieldwork - researcher interacting with locals.

frames.narration: Building trust and rapport is crucial for deeper understanding.
